name: Boots
description: Get ready for the winter season with these Men's Leather Boots by Ndure. They have been crafted with high quality Genuine Leather material which make them highly resilient and luxurious. A lace style with a smooth finish and padded insoles, these boots are perfect for all day wear. A rubber outsole provides grip, enhances the shoe durability and longevity.
